snippet: About a dozen undocumented immigrants from Latin America have told Suffolk County officials that police officers robbed them after pulling them over in traffic and asking to see a license.
abstract: Undocumented immigrants from Latin America have come forward to tell Suffolk County officials that police officers robbed them after pulling them over in traffic and asking to see a drivers license; surge of accusations, about a dozen to date, began after arrest of Suffolk County police officer who was caught on camera during sting operation stealing money from Latino undercover detective.
lead_paragraph: About a dozen undocumented immigrants from Latin America have told Suffolk County officials that police officers robbed them after pulling them over in traffic and asking to see a license.

headline.main: Latino Drivers Report Thefts by Officers
headline.print_headline: Latino Drivers Report Thefts by Officers
